edu.biu.protocols.CommitmentWithZkProofOfDifference

Class DifferenceCommitmentReceiverBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.CommitmentWithZkProofOfDifference.DifferenceCommitmentReceiverBundle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DifferenceCommitmentReceiverBundle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class used to hold some data of the receiver in the difference protocol.

    It is written to a file in the end of the offline phase and read again in the beginning of the online phase.

    This bundle holds the wCommitment which is the sigma array generated by the receiver, the decommitment of this w and the commitment pairs of a committed value.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf COhen)
    See Also:
